item.title: Pfsense
item.description: Title: My Journey with pfSense: Building a Secure Firewall Link to heading Introduction Link to heading I decided to implement a physical pfSense firewall after virtualising it for some years. Virtualising it had its downfalls. For example, when the “internet” decides it wants to drop because you’ve made some rookie networking errors ðŸ‘€ . Especially when the rest of your house depends on the routing you’re in control of.
